page.title: 17THE CHRISTMAS PARTY
page.content: At Christmas,I was asked to organise a {Christmas}party.First of all,I set up a committee of 5 people who would help with games, food and records.Most people brought money which we kept in a glass jar.The food was bought in Accrington by the girls.The boys helped with the{record player}and decorated the classroom.The day arrived and we were busy all morning getting the food ready.We made {jellies,sandwiches,cakes}and got the drinks sorted out.By dinner time it was ready.In the afternoon the party began.Games were played and prizes given.About 2.20pm.we ate and by the time we had finished,it was 2.40pm.Then we cleared up and danced until 3.00.When it had finished,I sat down with a special feeling of satisfaction.It was the best party I had been to. By Debbie Richardson.
